com.jde.model.entity.spawning

Class Spawner<S extends Spawnable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.model.entity.spawning.Spawner<S>

  • public class Spawner<S extends Spawnable>
extends java.lang.Object
    This Spawner class contains a list of Spawnable objects and make them spawn at the proper time
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)
